attributes.action: Pause Buying and Selling via Facebook Selling Pages.
attributes.additional_details: I’d like to see the Government forcing Facebook to pause buying and selling of items via Facebook buying and selling pages until the Lockdown rules have been relaxed.
attributes.background: During this difficult time, and against Government and Medical Professionals advice, people are still buying and selling non essential items via Facebook selling pages, therefore putting themselves and others at risk of spreading the Coronavirus.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Facebook, not the UK Government or Parliament.
